Articles.Content:
Did anyone create a working, complete fuel line/strut mod?

I\'ve found a need to have a smaller fuel line, opened up the DAE for the fuel line and the mount of stuff in there confuses me (those pivots especially). I tried just rescaling the whole thing to 50% but I got really strange results: the pipe part didn\'t change but the rest shrunk like 10 or 20 times - becoming nothing more that just a few pixels.

If someone knows how to properly do this, I\'d be grateful for some pointers...
Struts are like a damn puzzle box of mysteries wrapped in a candy shell of insanity. I\'ve never been able to get them working properly.

Struts are like a damn puzzle box of mysteries wrapped in a candy shell of insanity. I\'ve never been able to get them working properly.

That bad, eh? Well then, I\'ll be needing to bump the size of my droptanks then....

Actually, I found the secret. The struts stretch in the Z axis. So if you rotate only the object it will work. As long as the mesh itself has no rotation. Proof enough: look at my Project Kebylon. It has a custom heavy strut which works FINE.
